testcase.name: Latest Foreign Exchange Rate
testcase.system-out: Given The endpoint is already configured....................................passed When I input a valid date "latest"..........................................passed Then I should have the status code "200"....................................passed

testcase.name: Specific date Foreign Exchange rates
testcase.system-out: Given The endpoint is already configured....................................passed When I input a valid date "2015-05-13"......................................passed Then I should have the status code "200"....................................passed

testcase.name: Specific date Foreign Exchange rates
